functionDecorators.name: mint
functionDecorators.description: Calculates the amount of xc-amples to be mint based on the amount and the total supply on the base chain when the transaction was initiated and mints xc-amples to the recipient.

parameterDecorators.name: senderAddressInSourceChain
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the sender wallet in the transaction originating chain.

parameterDecorators.name: recipient
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the recipient wallet in the current chain (target chain).

parameterDecorators.name: amount
parameterDecorators.description: Amount of tokens that were {locked/burnt} on the source chain.

parameterDecorators.name: globalAMPLSupply
parameterDecorators.description: AMPL ERC-20 total supply at the time of transfer.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: reportRebase
functionDecorators.description: Forwards the most recent rebase information from the bridge handler to the xc-ample controller.

parameterDecorators.name: globalAmpleforthEpoch
parameterDecorators.description: Ampleforth monetary policy epoch from the base chain.

parameterDecorators.name: globalAMPLSupply
parameterDecorators.description: AMPL ERC-20 total supply from the base chain.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: validateAndBurn
functionDecorators.description: Validates the data from the handler and burns specified amount from the sender's wallet.

parameterDecorators.name: sender
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the sender wallet on the source chain.

parameterDecorators.name: recipientAddressInTargetChain
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the recipient wallet in the target chain.

parameterDecorators.name: amount
parameterDecorators.description: Amount of tokens to be burnt on the current chain (source chain).

parameterDecorators.name: globalAMPLSupply
parameterDecorators.description: AMPL ERC-20 total supply at the time of transfer burning.
